title: Nathan Drake and his wisecracking partner Victor “Sully” Sullivan embark on a dangerous pursuit of “the greatest treasure never found” while also tracking clues that may lead to Nathan’s long-lost brother.

imgUrl: https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w300/74xTEgt7R36Fpooo50r9T25onhq.jpg;The Batman;7.8;In his second year of fighting crime
title: Batman uncovers corruption in Gotham City that connects to his own family while facing a serial killer known as the Riddler.

imgUrl: https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w300/6DrHO1jr3qVrViUO6s6kFiAGM7.jpg;Sonic the Hedgehog 2;7.7;After settling in Green Hills
title: Sonic is eager to prove he has what it takes to be a true hero. His test comes when Dr. Robotnik returns
rating: this time with a new partner
column5: in search for an emerald that has the power to destroy civilizations. Sonic teams up with his own sidekick
column7: and together they embark on a globe-trotting journey to find the emerald before it falls into the wrong hands.

imgUrl: https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w300/1g0dhYtq4irTY1GPXvft6k4YLjm.jpg;Spider-Man: No Way Home;8.1;Peter Parker is unmasked and no longer able to separate his normal life from the high-stakes of being a super-hero. When he asks for help from Doctor Strange the stakes become even more dangerous
title: forcing him to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.
